issue.title: [FCD] Should be undefined behaviour to call atomic_future operations unless valid()

discussion.p: Both future and shared_future specify that calling most member functions on an object for which valid() == false produces undefined behavior. There is no such statement for atomic_future.

issue.resolution: Add a new paragraph after 30.6.8 [futures.atomic_future]/2 with the same words as 30.6.7 [futures.shared_future]/3.
